name: Collection
author: Steeve Lefebvre

sections.description:
Collection is a plugin allowing and simplifying the creation of custom post type and metabox.
NOTE (beta): This plugin is very felt, it is still in development phase!

Features Include

  • Create collections of post.
  • Adding category and tags dedicated to collections.
  • Add metabox dedicated to collections.
  • Add information to content with shortcode.
  • Take control of Divi projects.

Configuration

  1. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  2. Go to the plugin setting page, add your first collection and validate the changes. From your new collection exists and you can find it in the left admin menu of wordpress. You can also add a link in the different menus of the site.
  3. Click on the metabox tab. You will find your different collections and you will be able to assign them metabox personalized to each one of them.
  4. Now everything is ok, you can add items to your collections.

Credits

  • Pictures by Hélène titre “graphic designer”
sections.installation:
We now offer an installation service to assist you in this process. We will install any or all of our plugins and spend up to 2 hours with you for consultation and training. Visit our website for details.
My Local Webstop Plugin

Or

  • Navigate to Add New Plugin page within your WordPress.
  • Search for Quiz Master Next.
  • Click Install Now link on the plugin and follow the prompts.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Or

  • Upload plugin dir to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

sections.changelog:
• Added control project in divi.
  • Fixed bug metabox validation.

v 0.4

  • Adding taxonomy category support.
  • Adding taxonomy tag support.

v 0.3

  • Adding bodyClass function for collection.
  • Adding css tab for collection.

v 0.2

  • Add deletion after unnecessary types.

v 0.1

  • First release!

short_description: Create and manage implement your own custom post type collection. NOTE (beta): This plugin is very felt, it is still in development phase!

upgrade_notice.v 0.5:
• This version add the control of the publication type project in divi.
  • This version fixes a bug when saving metabox.
upgrade_notice.v 0.4: • This version adds category and tag management to the different collections.
upgrade_notice.v 0.3:
• This version allows to add the name of the collection in the classes of the body.
  • It also adds a css tab to customize your collections.
